General.Name: Anhui Wantong Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Anhui Wantong Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the transportation information system integration, application software development, and operation and maintenance services in China. It provides system integration solutions used in expressways, port terminals, urban intelligent transportation, trunk roads, inland waterways, logistics tracking and justice, taxation, insurance, education, and other industry information fields. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Hefei, China.

3.Name: Mr. Dasheng  Pan
3.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
